name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Coolify - Save LinkedIn & Twitter Posts In Collections

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Coolify lets you create collections for various use case and lets you save post directly from LinkedIn & Twtitter to it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**Twitter Support Added**
**Share Your Collection Feature Added**

LinkedIn and Twitter are great sources to get industry-level knowledge and insights. Coolify lets you save LinkedIn and Twitter posts to collections directly from the platforms themselves. It is useful for developers, marketers, SDRs, ARs, sales managers, and everyone else who uses LinkedIn and Twitter for their growth.

Follow these 5 steps to get started:

1. Sign up on Coolify and verify your email.
2. Download the extension and log in with your Coolify details.
3. Give the necessary permissions.
4. Now you can see a bookmark button appearing on all posts in your LinkedIn and Twitter feeds. Click it.
5. Save it to a collection or create a new one.
6. Yay!! You just mastered using Coolify.

**We will be integrating AI very soon, so you can chat directly with your collections using Coolify AI.**
